basisSet.dc:title: cc-pCVDZ(old)
basisSet.dct:abstract: DZP Double Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Core/Valence Double Zeta (cc-pCVDZ(old)) Basis -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References Al - Ar: (13s,9p,2d) -> [5s,4p,2d] K.A. Peterson (unpublished)
These preliminary core/valence primitives were available from the EMSL web site from 7/24/97 to 1/13/03 and are made available for the sake of continuity. The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
